function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Living in small apartments with several occupants in highly populated neighbourhoods predisposes the Afro-American community to acquire SARS CoV-2.","Impact":"Increased risk of SARS CoV-2 transmission and associated health issues. Also, social confinement and distancing can lead to feelings of loneliness, depression, and other mental health issues.","Mitigation":"Improving living conditions, increasing access to green spaces, and providing mental health support.","Technologies":"Urban planning, community health programs, mental health services.","People":"Afro-American community, inhabitants of small apartments in populated neighborhoods, senior citizens living alone.","Owner":"Local government, public health organizations, community organizations"},{"Description":"UGS (Urban Green Spaces) in Buenos Aires City is below the recommended value by the World Health Organization, and unevenly distributed.","Impact":"Negative impact on inhabitants' perception, health, and well-being, especially during the pandemic.","Mitigation":"Increasing the surface area of UGS, improving distribution, and promoting access to green areas.","Technologies":"Urban planning, green space development, GIS mapping.","People":"Inhabitants of Buenos Aires City, especially those living in areas with low UGS.","Owner":"Local government, urban planners, community organizations"},{"Description":"Over half of the population are senior citizens who live alone, and only 1.3% of the inhabitants share their homes with three or more occupants.","Impact":"Increased risk of social isolation, loneliness, and psychological problems, particularly for senior citizens during the pandemic.","Mitigation":"Implementing programs to support senior citizens, promoting social connections, and providing mental health resources.","Technologies":"Elderly care programs, community outreach, telemedicine.","People":"Senior citizens living alone, inhabitants living in single-occupant households.","Owner":"Local government, elderly care organizations, community support networks"}]}
